params.name: text
params.description: Text to use within the back link component. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored. Defaults to "Back".

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to use within the back link component. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored. Defaults to "Back".

params.name: href
params.description: The value of the link href attribute.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the container.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the tag.

params.name: element
params.description: Which html element to use to render the back link - `button` or `a`. If not provided, defaults to `a`.
